p11: ZilPay solution is a middleware service that: (i) provides encrypted private keys that you may use to manage your assets from the Blockchain networks in an easy and secure way; (ii) allows Users to create or restore existing wallets and to add numerous derived accounts/addresses for each Blockchain platform providing Native and JavaScript SDKs for Users to browse decentralized applications (“DApps”) through the mobile App or WebSite; (iii) allows Users to manage their accounts/addresses or to send and receive digital assets; and (iv) provides the access to all transactions detail page and reveal secret phrase.
p12: If ZilPay will operate, at any point in time, a validator or nodes to support the decentralised functioning of various Blockchain networks, it can perform the following Services: (i) select validator to delegate to, (ii) delegate to validators to earn staking rewards, (iii) share rewards with delegators (excluding commission), (iv) change delegation, (v) undelegate delegations to validators or (vi) redelegate a portion of your delegation to another validator.
